Products.PFGSelectionStringField
================================
``Products.PFGSelectionStringField`` provides one type of field content type for ``PloneFormGen``.

It adds selection field with string field next to it.

This is useful when you need some comment with the selected option.

Tested with
-----------
* Plone-4.2x
* Products.PloneFormGen-1.6.0

Repository URL
--------------
